title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: South Park neighborhood, day. The boys walk up to Butters' house. Stan knocks on the door. The door opens and Butters' father looks out

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yes?  Oh, hello, boys.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hello, sir. South Park Junior Detectives. We're wondering if you have any crimes to be solved, for a dollar.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Oooo, little crime stoppers, huh? Well, I'm afraid I don't have any crimes I need solved right now.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Awww, shit!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: All right, sir, well, please call us if you need anything.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I'll do that. Have fun, boys.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Stupid assholes!  How come nobody has a crime to solve?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yeah, maybe starting a detective club isn't such a bright idea.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: It's a great idea, we just have to keep working at it.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Oh, hello there boys.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hello, ma'am, we're detectives with the South Park Crime Unit. Do you have any crimes you need to be solved, for a dollar?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Ohh, neighborhood detectives, huh? Well let me thi-oh yes! There is something!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Really?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yes. Two days ago I put a fresh baked cherry pie out on my window sill to cool.  And later, when I went to get it, it was gone.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: My God...

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Have you reported this to any other authorities?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Noo, but I think it's a perfect case for you kids.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Cool! We'll see what we can find, ma'am.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're on the case.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: The old woman's house, backyard.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: What have you got, Marsh?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Detective McCormick found something interesting.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Jesus, we're too late.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I think we can piece this case together now.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: The old woman's house, living room. She and her husband sit back in arm chairs looking at news. The door opens and the boys rush in with the pie tin

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: My pie tin! Oooh, but what happened to the pie?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well, we've all talked it through and we've come up with a theory.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well, what do you thnk happened, little detectives?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You said you set the pie in the window sill, where it must have sat for some time.  But its sweet smell attracted the attention of somebody.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Your husband.  He wanted that pie badly, but he knew that he was not allowed to eat it yet.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Slowly the rage built inside his mind. "Why won't she let me eat that pie? Why does she always stop me from doing what I wanna do?!" His only solution became obvious: Kill her!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: His plan was to use a hammer.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Bash, bash, BASH your skull in, causing instant death.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Then to make it impossible for police to identify the body, he'd use a shovel to remove your head.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Then saw off the arms and legs.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: The torso he would dump into the lake.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: The arms and legs he would dissolve with acid and lye in the bathtub.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: And then, finally, he'd be able to eat that pie.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: But before he could go through with this entire plan, he discovered that the pie had already been eaten...  ...by your dog.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Looks like the game is over, old man!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Oh my God, what kind of television have you kids been watching??

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Just the news.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: All right, all right, you you boys run along now.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hey, you owe us a dollar, lady.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Fine, here, just go!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Wow, look, you guys! Our first dollar!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're in business!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: A basement, some time later. The dollar bill is newly framed and hung on a wall in ... Cartman's basement, which is now the South Park Detectives headquarters. Pictures of suspects are on the wall below the framed dollar, a chalkboard has some instructions listed, and some suspects already interviewed are listed on the wall beneath the stairs. Kyle puts a file away in a filing cabinet as the other boys do other tasks.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Kenny, you got the f-a-g on that perp in Washington

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Boys, you have a little visitor.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Is this the South Park Crime Unit?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Ah! Oh.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yes it is!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I lost my dollie.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Thank you, Ms. Secretary, that will be all.  And get some more cookies and coffee! We're not paying you to sit on your ass!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Do you kow where your doll is?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: If I knew where it was, it wouldn't be lost.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: All right, Sarah, come over here.  Now, I want you to describe what the doll looks like to our sketch artist, Kenny.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: She has curly blonde hair. And a red dress. And a turned-up nose. And a blue bow in her hair.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You got it, Ken?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: All right, let's see.  Damnit Kenny, that's not what she said!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Put that away, dude!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Don't worry, ma'am. We'll find your doll.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Sarah's house, day. The boys swarm into the girl's bedroom and check out all the possibilities.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: No sign of forced entry.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: But the window isn't locked.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Right, so it's possible that the theif sat out in that tree.  He would have watched Sarah with the doll, possibly while cutting the palms of his hands with a large knife.  The pain gave him sick pleasure.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Disposing of the doll wouldn't be easy. He would have had to have brough a shovel to decapitate it.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're going to need semen samples from everything in this room.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: All right, let's do this by the books! McDonnell,  give me smears of all the places the doll used to be!  Mitchell, run a tap on the phone!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hey, kid, what are you doing?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Agent Tucker, FBI! And you?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Detective Marsh. I'm in charge of this investigation!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: ...Not anymore, you're not!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hey, this is our case! You can't come in and take over!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Can't we? You guys are playing Detective. We're playing FBI. That gives us jurisdiction over you!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Aw crap!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I want choppers on the roof ready to go!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Dude, we've been working this case since two-thirty!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Good. Then you can help us by telling me everything you know.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Sarah's house, afternoon, outside. The boys have been kicked out by the FBI boys and head for the sidewalk

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Son of a bitch stupid FBI!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well, I guess we can go back to playing laundromat.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: No! We're not gonna stop playing detectives! We've just gotta find that doll before thos FBI guys do.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: (Yeah!)

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yeah, but how?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're gonna have to just start bringing in people for questioning.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Right. I think I know exactly where to start.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Cartman's basement, later. The boys have called Butters in and he's confused, being under the spotlight

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Where were you this morning at nine o'clock, Butters?!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Ah, I was at home.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Your story is full of holes and I'm gonna beat your ass if you don't start tellin' the truth!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: (Awww, don't be so hard. Maybe he's tellin' the truth, huh?)

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: They've gotten really good at this good cop-bad cop thing.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You're going down, Butters! You hear me?!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: (Aw. Now just be nice. Poor lil thing.)

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You're worth a two-dollar criminal and you're lying!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: (Aw, please don't make him confess.)

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well I don't have nothin' to confess. Honestly.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Fine! Then you won't mind giving us a semen sample.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: How do I do that?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You just make the semen come out of your body and fill it in this cup!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well how do I make semen... come out of my body?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Stop playing games!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I'm not playing. I really don't know!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: That does it! Wait right here!  Guys, did you hear that? Butters doesn't know how you make seme come out of your body.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: How... do you make semen come out?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I don't know. I was hoping you guys did.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: It's that thing we learned about in school where you pull on your weiner until white stuff comes out.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Really?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Ohh, right, you're supposed to pull and mager...venate your weiner really fast.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Oh okay.  Okay, retard, you really don't know how to make semen come out?!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: No-o!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Follow me to the bathroom.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: (Aw, it's okay kid. It's just done in a jiffy)

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: The Cartman hallway. Cartman takes Butters to the restroom

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Now, go sit on the toilet and pull and tug on your weiner until white stuff comes out, and then put it in this cup.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: My weiner??

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yes, retard. Semen comes from your weiner. Now do it!  Well Butters?!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Ah I'm pullin' on my weiner, but nothin's happening.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well pull harder!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: ...ow... Ow... It's not workin'

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Try doin' it faster

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Ow. Ow. Ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow ow. Naw, nothin'

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Butters, do you wanna go to jail for the rest of your life?!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: NOOooo!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: The you'd better get that semen sample no matter how long it takes!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Okay!!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Cartman! Cartman! We just got a tip that a doll was found near Fosse's house!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Let's go!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Fosse's house, a nice rambling house. Cartman approaches the front door as Stan, Kyle, and Kenny stand off to one side. He turns and places his back against the wall, then sneaks up to a window. He looks in just a bit. Inside, a boy plays with a doll... red dress, turned-up nose, blonde curly hair with two blue bows attached... just as Sarah had described. Two boys giggle as they play

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Huhuh, Okay Ms., Ms. Jones, heh, me and Doctor... Flick here just need to... check your vagina.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: That's gay.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yeah, that's gay.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Kyle!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: What?  What??

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I see two guys inside. They have Sarah Peterson's doll, you stupid Jew!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: They've got the doll!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Okay, okay. Ready? Break the door down!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Huh huh who is it?!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: South Park Junior Detectives! We know you have Sarah Peterson's doll!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: They're playing Detective.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: That's gay.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You're gay!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: What do we do now?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I don't know.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well if they're not gonna give us back the doll, then we have no choice. Let's go tell on them.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Dude, we just can't tell on them.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Why not?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Because, dude, we're playing detectives! Detectives don't just go tell on people.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Detectives!  If you don't get out of here, we're gonna rip the doll's head off!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yeah.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We were playing gynecologists and now we're playing criminals

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: That's gay.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're gay.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Jesus! They're gonna kill her!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We've got to do something.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Time! Time is what we need, but time is something we ain't got!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Attention! You in the house!  This is Agent Tucker with the FBI! We have you surrounded. Sort of.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hey, you buttholes can't play FBI here!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yeah! This was our hot lead!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: And you did a great job leading us here. Now you just stay out of our way!  The gig is up, Fosse! Bring out the doll! Or we'll tell on you!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're gonna charge the front door and go get it.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: No you're not.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Damnit man, this is not the time for negotiations! There's a little doll in there about to have her head twisted off!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Time out, kid! We say you can't charge the front door, and you have to obey what the FBI says! That's the rules!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Just because your parents can afford better toys than ours doesn't make you better than us!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yes it does so!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: ...Grrrr!!!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: (What do we do now?)

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We go get the doll ourselves.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: But they said we can't charge the front door.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: That's right.  But they didn't say anything about going in the back.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Come on guys. You don't wanna hurt that doll.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Huhuh.  Oh crap, they're coming in the back!  That's gay.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Bang bang bang! I got you, Fosse!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: No you didn't!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Did so!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: No, 'cause I got... special wizard armor on.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're not playing Dungeons and Dragons, assface!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: All right, that does it! Cover me! I'm going slo-mo!  Wwwaaahhh!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Oooh, they got me!  Whooaaa, whooaaa, whooaaa.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: rr uh rr uh, uhhhh.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're dead.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: That's gay.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We got it.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Sarah's house, later. Stan and the boys walk up to the house again. Stan knocks on the door, and Sarah's mother answers

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Ms. Peterson, is your daughter home?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: My dollie!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We got her back safe. We lost a lot of good men in the process.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well you boys are little heroes. I'm going to call the police department and let them know what brave little detectives you are!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Park County Police Station, day. This building is much bigger than the building Barbrady upholds the law from in South Park.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hello there little crime stoppers, I'm Lieutenant Dawson with the Park County Police. I heard you did a great job finding Sarah Peterson's doll.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We do what we can, sir.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: W-hell, that's fantastic, kids. And for all your terrific sleuth-solving, I'm hereby making you all Jenior Detectives.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Wow!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: That means you boys are now an official part of the department.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Kewl!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: All right, so ready for your first assignment?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Sure.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Okay. There's a meth lab down at 567 Mala Vista. The operators are probably armed to the hilt with illegal weapons. I want you to get down there and see what you can find!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Ah... a a a meth lab?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I don't want any problems. Just take them down by the books. Now get over there; the mayor's all over my ass on this one!  On, and deputies: you screw this up and I'll have you working graveyard shift behind a desk! Move it!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Nighttime in the boondocks. The boys walk along a barren stretch of road

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: What is a meth lab, anyway?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I don't know. Let's just hurry up. I wanna get home in time to watch Crime Drama.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: The meth lab. Three men sit around a table as a forth man works behind them. The juniro detectives approach the front door. Stan knocks. The men inside quickly arm themselves

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Uh police. Open up. ...Oh crap, did you guys do your math homework?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Nah. Dude, I totally spaced it.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You die, pigs!  You want to die, huh?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You won't take us alive!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: So long, coppers!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Damn.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Park County Police Dept., Dawson's office, later that night. He reads the police report and paces behind his desk

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: One UPS vehicle valued at twenty-five thousand dollars, one civilian vehicle valued at sixteen thousand, the second floor of the post office AND a coffee shop valued at sixteen thousand! The mayor's gonna have my ass!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Uh, sir, we just kinda got blind-sided by the-

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You got careless! Now, I don't know how they do things down at that dog-and-pony show they call the Fourth Grade, but here we have rules! Jesus, we don't have guys to question now, because you killed them all!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We're sorry.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: One more slip-up like that and I'll have your badges! You hear me?! Now hit the showers!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Park County Police Dept., locker room. Three men are changing clothes, so they're all in their briefs. The boys enter.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well well well, if it isn't the supercops.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hey Murphy, think they'll let me borrow their G.I. Joes?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Come on, you guys. Leave them alone.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Relax, Hopkins!  All fun and games, right?  Soho, tell us, rookies, you ah... find yourself a little bonus in that house??

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Uh bonus?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Come on! We all skim a little off the top. Oh. Or are you too good for that? So you think you're gonna waltz in here and clean up the system. Is that it?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We just wanna be junior detectives.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: LOOK, we all work hard! And we deserve more than the thirty-thousand a year we get paid! So what if we take in a little on the side?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Yeah! Who the hell are you to say that?!

text: I said, back off Murphy!

text: Why don't you and your rookie friends make us

text: That's right. Come on, bring it!

text: Yeah, let's go! Come on, bring it!

text: What the hell is the problem here??

text: No problem, sir. No problem at all.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Then hit the showers, all of ya!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: The shower room, moments later. Stan, Kyle, and Cartman are taking their showers. Kyle drops his soap to fart, then picks it up again. Cartman works on his hair

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Dude, I don't wanna play Detective anymore.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Me neither.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: It'll get better, guys.

text: Better how, dude?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Look, we said we wanted to form a club to protect and serve South Park. We put all this time to it, I mean... What do you guys wanna do, huh? Go back to playing Car Mechanics? Or Laundromat Owners?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: We were happy playing Laundromat Owners.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: I wasn't. We started playing Detective because we wanted our play time to mean something. Or have you forgotten why you joined the force, Kyle?

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Hey! Broflovski's a good cop!

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: You guys can go back to playing Laundromat Owners if you want, but... I'm not gonna give those kids playing the FBI a chance to laugh at us. See you guys at school tomorrow.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Cartman's house, night. His door opens, and a tired Cartman walks in

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Awwwwrrr-auugh.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Eric, where have you been? It's ten thirty.

text: We had to take down a meth lab on Mala Vista.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Well you should've called Mommy.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS

text: Looks like that meth lab you took down was the tip of the iceberg. They found a paper trail leading all the way to the biggest crime syndicate in Colorado.

And your little "shoot first ask questions later" technique has no place in this century! Now you get down to that strip joint and you do it by the books, you got it?! The mayor is on my ass and blablablah!

text: Inglewood, Colorado, night. A big city. The strip club shown is The Peppermint Hippo. Inside there are several dancers undulating for their patrons on individual stages. Other dancers dance on the club floor for individual patrons. The boys enter the club

text: Freeze! South Park detectives!  Great job, boys. You found the meth boss!

text: That's right.  Sometimes partnerships need to end.  Well, supercops, looks like I'll be taking in all the money now. I'm in business alone. And that means that the only person I can't trust... is myself.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Outside the Peppermint Club. The paramedics have arrived and are removing the bodies. Hopkins, up and about, reaches the boys

text: It looks like Murphy and Jenkins got what they deserved. If it weren't for you boys, we would have never cleaned up the department.

title: LIL  CRIME STOPPERS
text: Cartman's basement, next day. The boys are back at playing Laundromat. Two clothes racks are seen, and the detectives' desks are refashioned as washer/dryer combos. A "Laundromat" sign on the wall looks over the whole thing
